content: and the magic > loop method however as work > progresses it will be necessary to > use two long circulars to accommodate > the large number of sts > errata from designer errata the smaller size blanket should end after the line work 16 rounds b 552 sts working the additional 2 stripes results in running out of yarn > don t be alarmed when the blanket > comes off the needles looking all > wonky it will require fairly severe > blocking to achieve its square shape
